content: संस्थित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Being or standing together. {@--2@} Being, staying; नियोगसंस्थित <ls>Pt. 1. 92.</ls> {@--3@} Adjacent, contiguous. {@--4@} Resembling, like. {@--5@} Collected, heaped. {@--6@} Settled, fixed, established. {@--7@} Placed in or on, being in. {@--8@} Stationary. {@--9@} Stopped, completed, ended, finished; क्व नु खलु संस्थिते कर्मणि आत्पानं विनोदयामि <ls>Ś. 3.</ls> {@--10@} Dead, deceased; प्रमदामनु संस्थितः शुचा <ls>R. 1. 72.</ls>
